view-changelog.1_1_0: Added dynamic routes on main page when you click over a movie image to get details about that movie
view-changelog.1_2_0-1: Added dynamic trailers dialogs in /movie/id page
view-changelog.1_2_0-2: Added some aesthetic changes in /trailers page
view-changelog.1_3_0-1: Optimized code in the Genres section using v-bind and @click to use a single function to return movies of different genres
view-changelog.1_4_0-3: New responsive features in Ranking section and some aesthetic changes
view-changelog.1_5_0-2: Added new features (Watched, Favourite, Rate and To-Watch) in Ranking section using LocalStorage
view-changelog.1_6_0-3: Info button available in My Movies section
view-changelog.1_6_0-4: Now is possible to save the user rates for each movie in My Movies
view-changelog.1_7_0-2: Now you can search for movies and see information such as the platforms where those movies are available for streaming, buying or renting
view-changelog.1_7_2-1: More info is shown in Search section: dynamic movie genres (the API returns an ID for each movie genre and you have to 'translate' it in the specific genre); movie overview
view-changelog.1_7_2-2: Some aesthetic improvements in that section have been added
view-changelog.1_7_5-1: New info displayed in Search section: vote average and vote ratings
view-changelog.1_7_5-2: The 'View Trailer' button is now a component anywhere in the app
view-changelog.1_7_6: Fixed some issues with regard to the display of the trailer component
view-changelog.1_7_9-1: Fixed an issue with the API call in the trending section
view-changelog.1_7_9-2: Added an initial (non functional at this moment) page for user login and register
view-changelog.1_8_0-1: Fixed an issue with the API call in the trailers section
view-changelog.1_8_0-2: Aesthetic changes and improvements in the trailers section
view-changelog.1_8_0-3: Responsive improvements in the navbar component
view-changelog.1_9_0: Added a login/register system without backend using LocalStorage. Added avatar option. The user is now be able to save movies in some categories with each account. On the other hand, the default account has now some hidden features
view-changelog.1_9_2: Added permanent icons in the Ranking section. Now the icons will remain over each corresponding movie even if the user exits the view or logs out
view-changelog.1_9_5-1: Added reset statistics function in My Movies view
view-changelog.1_9_5-2: In the ranking section, if the movie has been previously selected, it will be deleted. Now you can remove the rate or overwrite it
view-changelog.1_9_5-3: Added 'show details' function when clicking in a movie in Ranking section
view-changelog.2_0_0-1: Added internationalization (ENG / SPA) in all the app
view-changelog.2_0_0-2: Improved and expanded the search system. Now, is posible to search by movie title or actor/actress name
view-changelog.2_0_0-4: Added a new to adding system
view-changelog.2_0_0-5: Added infinite scroll in Popular view (old Ranking view)
view-changelog.2_0_0-6: Now the user can search by year in Popular view
view-changelog.2_0_0-8: New components: Snackbar to success/error/info messages; loading data bar; 'Add to my Movies' dialog
view-changelog.2_1_0-1: (Backend) Added a login/register system with Firebase (Authentication) using E-mail and password
view-changelog.2_1_0-2: Added a navigation guard based on the authentication status
view-changelog.2_2_0-1: (Backend) Added the CRUD system for the user's movies
view-changelog.2_2_1-1: Added some fixes and style improvements
view-changelog.2_3_0-1: Added a Trivia game in Beta phase (pending internationalization and future changes)

view-about.title: About iMovies
view-about.text1: iMovies is an app to show information about movies using The Movie Database API.
view-about.text2: Since the 1.9.0 version, it is possible to save movies in some categories such as 'Favourite', 'Wish List', 'Watched' and 'Rated'.
view-about.text3: In November 2021 was released the 2.0.0 version with a lot of improvements and some new features. The storage system was improved and setted in a globally way, so the user is able to save and rate movies all around the app using LocalStorage.
view-about.text4: In the other hand, the landing page was changed in a 'Netflix style'. Ranking view was renamed as Popular, and it was added a symple way to search movies by year. The Search view was modified and it was included a dual search system: by movie, and by actor/actress name.
view-about.text5: Last but not least, it was added internationalization using i18n. So, both the app and the movies info is available in English and Spanish.
view-about.text6: This app is under constant development, and it will be new content in the future.
view-about.text7: Since the 2.1.0 and 2.2.0 version, was added a backend using Google Firebase for the user authentication and the movies storage in some categories

view-account.errorOldLogin: You must logout and login again to make the changes
